name: Linklight
description:
Simple on its surface and elaborate at its core. Linklight is a minimalist puzzle game that can be understood in mere seconds.



Mastering and successfully navigating its inner mechanisms however, will prove to be a much more difficult task.



Direct different power sources to the correct lightbulbs as you navigate and plan your course across dozens of levels. Be mindful that none of the sources cross each other’s path.

Features:

  • Dozens of handcrafted logic-based puzzles, the majority of which feature multiple solutions.
  • Progression; traverse through various sets of levels, all of which bring their own unique design and challenges.
  • Serene ambience; soothing ambient music tracks and sound effects.
  • Dynamic game board, feel the board come to life with every click.
  • Sleek, dynamic, and responsive UI.
